website_summaries.verdict: If you're looking for a water doodle mat for group play, this jumbo-sized model is a solid choice. One of the largest water doodle mats currently on the market.
pros: Large size easily accommodates multiple children
Stunning baby forest-animal border stands out from the crowd
Comes with a variety of art accessories, including markers, shapes, drawing booklet, and more
cons: Requires quite a bit of space
Sprawling border graphics use up more of the drawing surface than necessary

customer_reviews.title: Great toy for creative kids!
customer_reviews.text: This mat is huge! Way bigger then I pictured, that is great because each of my kiddos can take a side and not get in each others way. The markers take a bit to prep but once primed they work great! The colors spread a bit more then my perfectionist 4 year old would like but that isn't a big deal. This toy is great and will get a ton of use in our household!
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca

customer_reviews.title: No mess!
customer_reviews.text: My toddler is into painting and making a mess. We got this mat for him to feel like he's painting, and it works well for us. He likes to spend time playing with it, and then it can be stored away with no problem. I like that it comes in a reusable plastic bag, and not a cardboard box. The pad for the stamps seems kind of cheap, and we had to give our child a sponge to wet the stamps, because the felt pad wouldn't stay in place.
customer_reviews.author: Bob Stephen

customer_reviews.title: Nice mat has some flaws
customer_reviews.text: It says 10 min to go back from rainbow to color, however it took about 45 min to go back to completely white. The stamps dont work that well. The pens are really hard to get the top off. Cute cards that came with information. Needs a bag with it for transportation needs
customer_reviews.author: Momof632

customer_reviews.title: pens don't work but mat was fine
customer_reviews.text: Gifted this to my friend's boys under 2 yrs. They very very intrigued. Mat was great, but the pens were TERRIBLE. Will need to invest in better pens for the kids to enjoy this. Else, kids loved it and so did their mom.
customer_reviews.author: Orencia

customer_reviews.title: Kids of all ages liked it! Got them off their electronics!
customer_reviews.text: My kids really enjoyed this. Even my teenager decided to draw for a little bit. It’s almost like magic! Got the kids off their electronics to come draw!
customer_reviews.author: Sara

customer_reviews.title: Quarantine fun
customer_reviews.text: Great quarantine fun while moms trying to do her homework. I sit with them on the floor while they go crazy and great things is they are not coloring the walls!
customer_reviews.author: Arely Alvidrez

customer_reviews.title: Great product, keeps the littles busy
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my 4 yr old son and he LOVED it. We were traveling for the holidays, so I needed something to occupy him, that wouldn't cause a mess, this was perfect!!
customer_reviews.author: Sherry SULFRIDGE

customer_reviews.title: Need to entertain the kids for hours?  This is it!
customer_reviews.text: This mat was purchased for the two year old however it is also enjoyed by the 5,7 ans9 year old! It provides hours of entertainment!
customer_reviews.author: Doris D. Meneses

customer_reviews.title: No more mess
customer_reviews.text: My kids loved it 2,4,6 years old set around and we did not hear them for half an hour
customer_reviews.author: Ganjina

customer_reviews.title: No mess fun
customer_reviews.text: Great way for the kids to show off their art talents without the mess of paints or ink. Can be used on the floor or hanging on the wall.
customer_reviews.author: daisy link

customer_reviews.title: graffiti time
customer_reviews.text: this family loves the creativity this mat produces...it keeps the kids pre occupied .
customer_reviews.author: joseph b.

customer_reviews.title: In a group or alone perfect for both
customer_reviews.text: Saving this for a present for my daughter for Christmas. Looking forward to seeing how happy she will be. It's so easy to use and clean up. Perfect for on the go or play groups, classrooms or even just at home relaxing.
customer_reviews.author: Tanya McNeil

customer_reviews.title: Huge Mat
customer_reviews.text: I like that this is a big piece and all my kids can play at the same time. No more fighting who gonna use first. Too much fun for them while learning.
customer_reviews.author: Mymei

customer_reviews.title: Such a let down
customer_reviews.text: Love the mat but the markers that came with it are unable to open in order to fill with water. Very disappointing
customer_reviews.author: Doug M

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely love!!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my 1 year old and his cousins to share and they absolutely love it. I love it because it's big enough for them to share. Absolutely love that it's just water in the markers... best idea ever
customer_reviews.author: katie goins

customer_reviews.title: Fun and worth the price!
customer_reviews.text: Great tool for my OT toolbox! Little ones love how easy it is to hold the water markers, the stencils, and doing it all on the floor! The little animal facts were a cute bonus too!
customer_reviews.author: Kham

customer_reviews.title: Fun for sure!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves this! The pens were a little difficult to open for the first time and one of them leaks allot. But all in all a great product.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Goodding

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use with no cleaning mess
customer_reviews.text: My kids loved it! It is easy to use, very straightforward and with no mess and no cleaning :)
customer_reviews.author: Susanna D'Aleo

customer_reviews.title: Great way to keep kids busy!
customer_reviews.text: This product is one of the best things I've ever gotten for my kids. They use it every day!
customer_reviews.author: Maggie K

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product!!
customer_reviews.text: Amazing product, my kids will absolutely love this!! 5 star recommendation!
customer_reviews.author: Autumn Mariee

customer_reviews.title: Grandkids love it
customer_reviews.text: My 2 grandkids age 2 and 4 love this mat. Extra large so both kids can use it
customer_reviews.author: David H. Winston

customer_reviews.title: I wouldn’t buy again
customer_reviews.text: The box came opened and destroyed for sending it as a gift. I can’t believe It. U pay all this money for shipping next day and this is what u get. Also, the message I added onto this gift came all folded up and ripped.
customer_reviews.author: Linda

product_meta.title: Large Doodle Mat, Large Water Drawing Mat for Kids MAGIC Water Doodle Drawing Mat Mess-Free, Non-Toxic, Eco-Friendly, Reusable 59 Inches x 35 Inches Includes Drawing Guide, Stencils
product_meta.description:
The Kids Doodle Mat Every Family Loves



Seeing your child enjoy making art iswonderful - until you see the mess they are making. And, while we’ll happilyclean up messes in the name of creativity, wouldn’t it be better if you couldavoid sticky situations altogether?



Meet Magic, the water drawing matfor toddlers and kids that makes magic with water!



We’ve increased the size of our doodledrawing mat, giving your child more room to color and paint. In fact, the 59 x35 inch doodle mat has enough room that several children can work at once,whether on the floor or on the table. Plus, we’ve included stencils, shapes,and a drawing book guide to help spark your child’s imagination!



It’s the safest, easiest way to giveyour child the gift art - while keeping them (and your home) mess-free.



How It Works



Getting Started Is Easy！Turn the top of the pen clockwise to open.Fill the pen with with water.Tighten the top of the pen by turning clockwise.Wait two minutes and then get started! Your child’s work willbe displayed for up to 10 minutes before the water dries and the color disappears. And, like magic, your child can start all over again! No wastedpaper. No spilled paint. No messes.



Parents love having a water drawing matfor kids because it’s so safe and easy to use.



No Ink



No Paint



Non-Polluting



Reusable



Sturdy Nylon Material



Protect your child, your home and theenvironment!



Click “Add to Cart” Now!
feature_bullets: LARGE DOODLE MAT FOR XL FUN: The large doodle mat is big enough for several kids to color at once. Place on the floor or table at home or at hotels.
DRAWING KIT ACCESSORIES: Each Magic water drawing doodle mat includes a drawing guide, stencils and fun shapes. Educational design makes learning fun!

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.5 out of 5 stars72 ratings4.5 out of 5 stars
